dmca.title: Illegal use of my Images
dmca.body:
_____  

From: John White [mailto:john.white161@verizon.net] 
Sent: Monday, April 03, 2006 7:20 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com;
copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Illegal use of my Images


 In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, I am notifying you

of the illegal use on my images on your web server(s) and I respectfully
request that you remove my images immediately.
 
1.   A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on 
behalf of the owner of the copyright or other rights that have been 
allegedly infringed.
 
I, John White am the sole copyright holder of the snowy owl (aka O RLY OWL) 
images used on these two websites:
 
 <http://www.orlyowls.com/> http://www.orlyowls.com/
 <http://www.crazytees.com/product.php?productid=16220>
http://www.crazytees.com/product.php?productid=16220
 
  
2.    Identification of the copyright or other rights that have been 
allegedly infringed.
 
The person(s) are illegally using my snowy owl photograph(s) for commercial 
gain without my permission. They removed my copyright notice from my 
original on-line images posted here:
 
 <http://www.animalpicturesarchive.com/view.php?tid=1&did=142307>
http://www.animalpicturesarchive.com/view.php?tid=1&did=142307
 <http://www.animalpicturesarchive.com/view.php?tid=1&did=142296>
http://www.animalpicturesarchive.com/view.php?tid=1&did=142296
 
 
3.   The URL used in connection with the sale of the allegedly infringing 
merchandise.
 
 <http://www.orlyowls.com/> http://www.orlyowls.com/
 <http://www.crazytees.com/product.php?productid=16220>
http://www.crazytees.com/product.php?productid=16220
 
  
4.   Your name, address, telephone number and email address.
 
John White
2815 N. Van Buren St.
Arlington, VA 22213-1517
(703) 536-2531
  <mailto:John.white161@verizon.net> John.white161@verizon.net
 
  
5.   A statement that you have a good-faith belief that use of the material 
in the manner complained of is not authorized by the rights owner, its agent

or the law.
 
  
I, John White am the photographer and sole copyright owner of the images in 
question. I did not give anyone permission to sell products containing my 
snowy owl photographs.
 
  
6.    A statement that the information in the notification is accurate and, 
under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the 
owner of the copyright or other right that is allegedly infringed.
  
 
The information given in this complaint is accurate. I am the copyright 
owner of the images.
 
  
If you require additional information, please contact me.
 
Regards,
 
John White
